rules_text:
Ward– Discard a card
[i]Reader's Delight[/i] – Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, target creature you control gains skulk until end of turn.
[i]Bibliophile[/i] – As long as there are three or more instant or sorcery cards in your graveyard, whenever Ophelia, Dramatic Heroine attacks, return an instant or sorcery card at random from your graveyard to your hand.
